title: 1999/257/EC: Council Decision of 29 March 1999 concerning the conclusion of the Convention on the International Commission for the Protection of the Oder
header:
COUNCIL DECISION
of 29 March 1999
concerning the conclusion of the Convention on the International Commission for the Protection of the Oder
(1999/257/EC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body:
The Convention on the International Commission for the Protection of the Oder is hereby approved on behalf of the Community.
The text of the Convention is attached to this Decision.

The President of the Council is hereby authorised to designate the person or persons empowered to deposit the instrument of approval with the General Secretariat of the Council in accordance with Article 18(2) of the Convention.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 29 March 1999.
For the Council
The President
